abstract: Sebastian Vettel, the championship leader, crashed, and Jenson Button, second in the series, was fastest in both practice sessions.  Meanwhile, Bernie Ecclestone bought 3,000 tickets for the tsunami victims.
snippet: Sebastian Vettel, the championship leader, crashed, and Jenson Button, second in the series, was fastest in both practice sessions.  Meanwhile, Bernie Ecclestone bought 3,000 tickets for the tsunami victims.
